segments.text: This is a good basic computer package . It's got a good CPU , 256 megabytes of RAM , and a DVD player .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it come with a modem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it has a built-in modem . You just plug a phone line into the back of the computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A 15 - inch monitor is included in the deal . If you want , you can switch it for a 17 - inch monitor , for a little more money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's okay . A 15 - inch is good enough . All right , I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2
